content.question: /** Precondition: Strings one and two have the same length. */ public static String combine(String one, String two) { String res = ""; for (int k = 0; k < one.length(); k++) { if (one.substring(k, k + 1).equals(two.substring(k, k + 1))) { res += one.substring(k, k + 1); } else { res += "0"; } } return res; } What is returned as a result of the call combine("10110", "01100") ?

skill.text: 3.C: Determine the result or output based on code that contains procedural abstractions.
